column5: I hear the fishing is picking up on the Red out to the far North? Any reports you wish to share guys/gals?Thanks,

Fished Pine falls today. Our biggest was 28.5" We caught around 100 fish. Everyone was catching fish today and doing well. Didn't hear of any really big fish though.Fished the Red a few days ago. Some fish being caught. Some boats doing well, others not so much. Fish are shallower that you would expect Some big fish being caught. Not nearly as good as PF at present
